content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Mining Setup at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Wooden Chest at position (-15.5, -51.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -51.5) with pickup position (-15.5, -51.5) and drop position (-13.5, -51.5)

### Iron Plate Production at Position (62.0, -53.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (62.0, -53.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (60.5, -52.5) with pickup position (59.5, -52.5) and drop position (61.5, -52.5)
- Burner Inserter at position (63.5, -52.5) with pickup position (62.5, -52.5) and drop position (64.5, -52.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting items from non-existent entities
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to extract from exists and contains the item. Double-check the position and type of the entity before attempting extraction.

### Errors due to insufficient inventory items
- Before attempting to insert items into another entity, verify that your inventory contains the required quantity of items. Keep track of your inventory levels to avoid such errors.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placement. Check for existing entities occupying the target tile to avoid conflicts.

### Errors with inserter operations
- Ensure that inserters have a valid source and destination for their operations. Check that the inserter's pickup and drop positions are correctly aligned with the intended entities.
